about_the_game:
AfroCobra is a side scrolling action love letter to Kung Fu Master / Spartan X. With 16-bit stylized pixel graphics for a throwback to the roots of action platforming. A fast-paced beat em up style game, with non-stop action and enemy assaults. Duck, jump, kick, and use the power of Dragonflys to stay alive and on the move.

Fast-Paced Beat Em Up Arcade Style Action: With a constant flow of enemies and stage hazards, keeping your reflexes sharp and quickly strategizing is your only chance for survival. Enemy movement and logic cover a wide range and must be quickly identified to overcome their threat.

Unique Atmosphere and Progression: Level designs and unique level music ques invite you to experience different feelings and environments as each is designed to reward players with a sense of progression as the game unfolds. Slowly feel time turn from day to night, before taking on the ultimate final boss.

Familiar But New Feel: Gameplay style that will feel recognizable to any action platform gamer, while introducing a flow of level design not seen in earlier action platformers that inspired it.
